description:
***Notice*** I am moving Southwest. I am not looking for anyone that doesn't live anywhere remotely close to the desert**

I am sympathetic, charitable, genial, unassuming, visionary, intuitive, and have a subtle sense of humor. I don't belong to any particular religious sect, due to a need to find my own path and experience truth for myself. At times I do enjoy volunteering to help less fortunate individuals. I love nature and animals, especially horses. I feel a connection to the yoUniverse as a whole, and feel a rapport with all living creatures.

I love the colorful, the beautiful, the musical, and the magical. I am attracted to metaphysics and want to innerstand the deeper truths of life. I am very artistic as well. I enjoy writing short stories, poetry, songs, painting, sculpting, crafting jewelry, and singing.

I am upright, moral and have a well-defined sense of ethics. I have a strong respect for honesty in others. I enjoy learning things that involve nutrition, natural healing, astrology and psychology. I love learning and absorb information of interest, like a sponge.
